name: Sea of Sedna Demo!
description:
Dive into the Sea of Sedna!
As Figgy tries to get some rest, the Cephalopods attack!

Make your way through reefs and caves and discover who's behind it all!

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move

X - Shoot

Z - Super

A - Pause

Esc - Fullscreen

This is just a demo! 4 stages and 2 bosses! I plan to have at least double that in the full game. 

All art, coding, and music done by KeroLense

Made in Pixel Game Maker MV

Check out the soundtrack at:

https://kerolense.bandcamp.com/album/sea-of-sedna-demo

or

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjb2FwzU5DF0Wh5HSkVLGry2ks4S67nGl
